1.title: The Fated Man... Forgive Me, Mother Is a Woman Too

episode of.title: Star Man: kono hoshi no koi (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

1.plot: Uno Sawako lives a quiet life out in the countryside with her three sons and mother. Seems her husband has run off on her, but Sawako's determined to keep moving forward with a smile. One day she nearly runs into a handsome young man standing in the middle of the road, where he promptly collapses. Taking him home and finding out he has amnesia, Sawako determines to take advantage of that and turn him into her new husband, whom she names "Hoshio" or "Starman." Things seem to be starting off well, but there's something not quite right about the mysterious Hoshio.

2.title: Sudden Development! Hoshio-Papa's Ex-girlfriend Invades!

episode of.title: Star Man: kono hoshi no koi (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

2.plot: Sawako goes out on a date with Hoshio and tells him the story of how they met. Before that though, Hoshio struggles with both his lack of memory as well as his lack of skills. Meanwhile, a mysterious woman appears in town and she's looking for Hoshio as well.

3.title: It Was All a Lie... The Disappearing Husband Returns

episode of.title: Star Man: kono hoshi no koi (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

3.plot: Sawako finds the strange woman who has invaded her home has some connection to Hoshio, forcing her to come clean about all her lies. Hoshio reluctantly leaves, but it isn't long before the situation changes once more as other strange new events start occurring that may bring Hoshio back to Sawako.

4.title: The Disappearing Husband... Hoshio's Memories Return at Last

episode of.title: Star Man: kono hoshi no koi (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

4.plot: Sawako's runaway husband returns to make a difficult situation even more so; meanwhile Hoshio decides he needs to do more to be a father. Shoko sets up a communication device aimed at the stars, but she seems to be communicating with people closer by.

5.title: Hoshio's Violent True Nature a New Mystery

episode of.title: Star Man: kono hoshi no koi (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

5.plot: Hoshio's change of personality provides Sawako with yet another challenge - but she might end up wishing for the old Hoshio instead. Still, his change will affect the many people around them and bring out some new secrets as well.

6.title: His Identity at Last! The Start of the Miracle

episode of.title: Star Man: kono hoshi no koi (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

6.plot: Hoshio is getting along well with his new family, but he's beginning to realize he may not be the only one in his body. Meanwhile Sawako worries that what's happening may be too good to last while Shoko expresses her feeling to Shigeta.

7.title: The New Chapter of the Star Prince Lover Begins

episode of.title: Star Man: kono hoshi no koi (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

7.plot: Hoshio and Shigeta try to explain everything to Sawako and her family, but Sawako has more personal issues on her mind. Meanwhile Shoko insinuates herself into Shigeta's family; much to his consternation. But with the sudden appearance of a bright light in the night skies, things may be changing once again.

8.title: The Dangerous Power's Premonition of a Secret Farewell

episode of.title: Star Man: kono hoshi no koi (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

8.plot: While Sawako learns about what it's like to live with a space alien from Shigeta's wife, Hoshio and Shigeta talk about life on Earth. Meanwhile though, Sawako worries about just what sort of love they have while Shoko finds out a shocking secret concerning her own past.

9.title: A Major Incident at the Uno Home! The Pick-Them-Up Invasion

episode of.title: Star Man: kono hoshi no koi (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

9.plot: Hoshio gets a job and finds himself having to use his powers to save a coworker. In the meantime, Sawako finds herself in the middle of a fight at her own work that may expose one of the aliens among her. But that distraction is set aside when it appears that her oldest son, Dai, may have run away from home.

10.title: The Tears That Come After Goodbye

episode of.title: Star Man: kono hoshi no koi (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

10.plot: Hoshio and the other aliens get a visit from space, but it turns out not to be quite for who they expected. Just as Sawako and Hoshio's relationship seems to have found its groove at last, a new and surprising distraction comes along that will change both their lives..

imdb.plot outline: Hirosue Ryoko plays the role of Uno Sawako, a plucky single mother of 3 boys. Due to her personality, fearing that she will be the ruin of him, Sawako's husband takes off and abandons her and their 3 boys. Sawako is left to bring up their 3 sons by herself, with the help of her grandmother. Living an average normal life, one day, Hoshio, a man who is suffering from amnesia, suddenly appears before her. Even though he is much younger than her, Sawako falls in love with Hoshio at first sight. A dormant heart that now has love awakened, Sawako decides to keep Hoshio by her side by telling him, "You are my husband" - Will Sawako be able to struggle through balancing the reality of being a mother of 3 boys with her immature tendre for Hoshio?
imdb.title: Star Man: kono hoshi no koi
akas: Star Man: kono hoshi no koi (Japan)
plot: Hirosue Ryoko plays the role of Uno Sawako, a plucky single mother of 3 boys. Due to her personality, fearing that she will be the ruin of him, Sawako's husband takes off and abandons her and their 3 boys. Sawako is left to bring up their 3 sons by herself, with the help of her grandmother. Living an average normal life, one day, Hoshio, a man who is suffering from amnesia, suddenly appears before her. Even though he is much younger than her, Sawako falls in love with Hoshio at first sight. A dormant heart that now has love awakened, Sawako decides to keep Hoshio by her side by telling him, "You are my husband" - Will Sawako be able to struggle through balancing the reality of being a mother of 3 boys with her immature tendre for Hoshio?::Fuji TV
